title: Drone Swarm Threat Assessment
description: An operator must assess an approaching swarm of small, unidentified drones to determine if they are a coordinated threat to a naval vessel.

tasks.description: Detect and track the multiple small, fast-moving drone contacts on radar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully tracks all individual elements of the swarm.

tasks.description: Analyze the swarm's behavior, noting its cohesive formation and direct vector towards the ship.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly identifies the behavior as coordinated and hostile.

tasks.description: Classify the swarm as an imminent threat and recommend engagement with close-in weapon systems (CIWS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator makes a rapid and correct threat assessment and recommends the appropriate defensive action.
